sense.def:
One's body
so vsi deli telesa, na primer glava, roke in noge.

seg.quote: His whole body felt as if it were on fire.

sense.def:
One's body
je lahko tudi samo osrednji tel telesa - brez glave, rok in nog.

seg.quote: They respond with slow movements of their arms, legs, and bodies.

sense.def:
A body
je mrtvo človeško telo.

A body
je tudi organizirana skupina ljudi, ki se z nečim uradno ukvarja.

seg.quote: They are members of a larger body called the Senate Committee.

sense.def:
The body of a car or aeroplane
je osrednji del avtomobila ali letala, brez motorja, koles in kril.
